quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
author: Stephen King

quote: Never put off to tomorrow what you can do to-day.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: Les Brown

quote: Positive thinking can be contagious. Being surrounded by winners helps you develop into a winner.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it. A man will find that as he alters his thoughts toward things and other people, things and other people will alter towards him.
author: James Allen

quote: The greatest development comes from embracing challenges and learning from them.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: There is no path to Happiness. Happiness is the path.
author: Dan Millman

quote: All happiness depends on courage and work.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: People who bite the hand that feeds them usually lick the boot that kicks them.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.
author: Ayn Rand
